Class Site

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.Site

  • public class Site
extends Object
    Object contains setting for crawler.

    0.1.0
    Author:
    code4crafter@gmail.com
    See Also:

        public Site addHeader(String key,
                      String value)
        Put an Http header for downloader.
        Use addCookie(String, String) for cookie and setUserAgent(String) for user-agent.
        Parameters:
        key - key of http header, there are some keys constant in Site.HeaderConst
        value - value of header
        Returns:
        this
